name: Image Sourcing
description: Validates that all images are sourced, URLs extracted, and licenses verified

any_of.description: Image research audit with sourced images and license verification
Image documentation with sourced images and license verification
Image migration manifest with URLs and attribution
TypeScript image data with URLs and attribution

validations.description: At least one image sourcing artifact must exist

notes: G4.5 is flexible because image sourcing artifacts vary by essay. Some essays use SVG-only illustrations (no external images), in which case this gate may be manually passed with a note. The any_of pattern accommodates the different formats that have been used historically.
